meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving railroads.
meanings.sent1: The park had a nonrailroad theme, with no train rides or tracks in sight.
meanings.sent2: Her nonrailroad backpack was covered in colorful flowers instead of train motifs.
meanings.sent3: The nonrailroad picnic blanket was decorated with pictures of airplanes and boats.
meanings.sent4: His nonrailroad mindset was like a road diverging from the train tracks of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The nonrailroad world was a vast expanse of highways and fields, far from the steel rails of trains.

meanings.definition: Not characteristic of or associated with railroads.
meanings.sent1: The modern art museum had a nonrailroad aesthetic, with no train paintings in sight.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was a mix of nonrailroad patterns, like polka dots and stripes.
meanings.sent3: The nonrailroad party theme featured hot air balloons and sailboats instead of trains.
meanings.sent4: His nonrailroad taste in music was like a symphony without the familiar chug of a train.
meanings.sent5: The nonrailroad scent of the flowers filled the room, a fragrant departure from the usual train station smells.
